bv3:19.2: vasi → ajjhāvasī jino (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); so vasī (pts-vp-pli1-2)
bv3:23.2: sirīghare → sirighare (bj); vasī jino (sya1ed, sya2ed); sirīdhare (pts-vp-pli2)
bv3:30.3: tamantarahitaṁ → samantarahitaṁ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2, mr)
bv3:32.1: Dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato vaṁso → dīpaṅkarabuddhavaṁso (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed)
